short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Download images from the current page, including CSS background images.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple Image Downloader is a simple and efficient Chrome extension that allows you to quickly download all images from the current webpage. The extension scans both HTML tags and CSS background images in various formats such as PNG, JPG, JPEG, SVG, and WebP. With a user-friendly interface, you can select only the images you want and download them. The extension includes options to check for CSS images, ensuring you capture everything. Perfect for web developers, designers, and anyone who needs to gather images fast.
